system.prerequisites:
Divining the Future
OW: Psy Rating 5
system.sustained: After the Psyker Succeeds on their Focus Power Test, they gain +5*Psy Rating to Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill Tests. Ballistic Skill Tests to target them have -5*Psy Rating. As a Half Action, can warn all allies within 5m x Psy Rating of them about incoming attacks, causing Ballistic Skill Tests against them to have -10. This Power cannot be used at Fettered Strength.
